title: Bug 38131ajc needs -d option while correctly compiling classes from subpackage
OB: A directory "subpackage" is created under the existing "subpackage" directory when using ajc command to compile classes from the subpackage.
EB: It would be nice to have the same behavior as javac when compiling classes from the subpackage.
SR: Use the -d option while correctly compiling classes from the subpackage.
